title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image does not refresh and continues to display the original image.
OB: After importing the new image, the layout still displays the original image.
EB: After importing the new image, the layout should display the new image.
SR:
1. Open the layout.
2. Import the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
3. Verify that the layout still displays the original image, not the newly imported image.
